text: Julie Anne Etchingham (born 21 August 1969) is an English journalist. ==Works== She is currently a television news presenter for ITV News. A graduate of Newnham College, Cambridge, Etchingham joined the BBC as a trainee after completing her studies. She then went on to present the children's news program BBC Newsround in 1994. She joined Sky News in 2002. She also presented editions of Five News when Sky won the contract to produce news programming for Channel 5 in 2005. Etchingham is also currently a news presenter on ITV News at Ten and has been since 2008. She also presented the current affairs show Tonight from 2010 until 2022, when she announced that she would now report for the show. Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:English journalists
title: Julie Etchingham
